com.captcha.botdetect

Class CaptchaRandomization

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.captcha.botdetect.CaptchaRandomization

  • public final class CaptchaRandomization
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class used for easy randomization of Captcha parameters.

      • getRandomCodeLength

        public static int getRandomCodeLength()
        Returns:
        a random Captcha code length, using default code length bounds

      • getRandomCodeLength

        public static int getRandomCodeLength(int max)
        Returns:
        a random Captcha code length, using the default minimal value and the specified maximal value

      • getRandomCodeLength

        Returns:
        a random Captcha code length, using the specified minimal and maximal values

      • getRandomCodeStyle

        public static CodeStyle getRandomCodeStyle(CodeStyle... usedValues)
        Returns:
        a random Captcha code style. Selects from all available styles if no parameter is specified, or from the given value set if specified

        public static com.captcha.botdetect.ImageStyle getRandomImageStyle()
